Class LoginHandler

    • server.LoginHandler

extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      LoginHandler()
      The Loginhandler stores data of all players and generates lists if needed

    • Method Detail

      • addPlayer

        public java.lang.String addPlayer​(java.lang.String playerName,
                                  ConnectionHandler connectionHandler)
        adds a new player to HashTable playerTable if name is already in the list, numbers from 1 to n are added until name is free.
        Parameters:
        playerName - playername to check/add
        connectionHandler - connectionHandler object for Playername
        Returns:
        choosen playername

      • removePlayer

      • getPlayerList

        public java.lang.String[] getPlayerList()
        get List of all players
        Returns:
        String[] with all players connected to the server

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName​(ConnectionHandler connectionHandler)
        getName is used to get a Playername for a connectionhandler
        Parameters:
        connectionHandler - this players's client's object
        Returns:
        The players name

      • getConnectionHandler

        public ConnectionHandler getConnectionHandler​(java.lang.String playerName)
        get Connectionhandler from name by using inverse() from Guava
        Parameters:
        playerName - player that asks for connectionhandler
        Returns:
        ConnectionHandler object for corresponding playerName
